text.section: If any such officer is an accuser, the court shall be convened by superior competent authority, and may in any case be convened by that superior authority if considered desirable by that authority.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 25, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 21, effective July 1, 1954.
